experience: You and Georg both know Peter Reno, Jim Skidmore, and 47 others
You both worked at Charles Schwab
Georg worked at Charles Schwab before you started
City and County of San Francisco
Part of a new Cybersecurity  and IT audit team
Sr. Tech. Program/Project Manager/Scrum Master - Release Management and DevOps

Assisted with streamlining continuous integration and delivery and defined standards for projects before production. Played central role in preparation for company’s Black Friday events and represented 20 individual development groups during end-to-end stress tests. Coordinated and triaged all project requests and security related issue resolution for global product DevOps. Tracked and documented in Jira. Worked with company headquarter and local security teams migrating any exposed security threats both for infrastructure and for application level fixes. Supported year-long project effort migrating company’s US general merchandise (walmart.com) web site to HTTPS involving eight departments and 50 individual contributors.  Managed continuous process for enterprise vulnerability management across several platforms including newer node-based platforms and legacy Java platforms. Aided with configuring Akamai cloud monitoring software streamlining and improving incident monitoring and response. Improved release processes using Agile methodology. Directed deployment of 20+ major releases and 30+ minor releases/patches during year. Tracked and triaged all change requests for Akamai and helped implement automation tool to interact with Akamai Luna control panel and Akamai APIs resulting in decreased professional services costs and increased efficiency of Akamai changes.
Senior Technical Project Manager, Schwab.com Release Manager and Agile Scrum Master

Communicated with all levels of management and business. Managed multiple priorities. Supported all contingencies and shifting project deliverables. Resolved business and service impacting problems evaluating all alternatives and consulted with other technical members of organization. Led all aspects of project and release management within deployment and configuration management including deployment of multiple UNIX and Windows customer-facing applications and systems.Served as program manager for website release process including process requirements, team, and vendor management encompassing dependencies, conflicts, and resolution of all issues. Worked with team on fine-tuning release management activities including packaging and deployment scripts and processes. Performed Agile functions inspecting and adapting as needed. Familiarized with both TFS and JIRA tools. Implemented Agile Scrums and ceremonies. Adhered to compliance-focused processes including documenting all changes in TFS and in Remedy. Negotiated release dates with change management and data center to manage risks and control timing of change introductions. Introduced company- wide change system with fixed slots for all applications. Facilitated and contributed to company website local governance and architectural and design review meetings. Provided production support and worked with development and quality services, business operations, data center operations, and change management. Directed deployment of 20+ Schwab.com releases and additional point releases/break fixes a year. Improved release management process continuously ensuring smooth production deployments. Ensured releases were implemented without delay and below budget.
Sr. Staff Release and Project Coordinator

Coordinated release and project implementation for various major platforms, including Unix, Linux, and .NET with all of the associated tool, process, and application software infrastructure.With priority on schwab.com, ensured that all releases were implemented as planned, and avoided any negative impact to external customers, business partners, quality control and development.  Helped install into production all assigned applications in the most efficient and timely manner by working with various teams: e.g., BusinessLogicTier, Help&Advice, Availability and Change Management, to coordinate release dates, negotiate install schedules to manage risks, and control the introduction of changes in close proximity of each other.  Co-facilitated schwab.com Local Governance, and attend review board meetings.  Provided production support.
Specialized in technical and security audits including data centers and reported results.
Business Administration with a concentration in Organization and Data Processing.

recommendations: Scott Gallagher
Technology Executive | Change Agent | Optimizer | Leader
May 15, 2017, Georg reported directly to Scott

An outstanding leader who is also an extremely thoughtful coach and mentor is the phrase that comes to mind when I think about Scott. I’ve had the pleasure of knowing Scott for more than ten years, and two of those years he was my direct supervisor at Charles Schwab.Above all, I was impressed with his ability to tackle the toughest challenges – effortlessly.  He has the vision and energy on both a strategic and operational level which allows him to make things happen.Scott is a highly inspiring leader and would be a tremendous asset to any organization.  Scott earns my highest recommendation.

Zina Okun
Senior Project Manager | Technical Scrum Master, CSM
October 17, 2015, Georg worked with Zina in different groups

As a Schwab.com release manager, I worked with Zina on getting many releases deployed into production.  Zina is a senior QA lead and a scrum master and was responsible for several challenging and complex projects and was always on top of it.  Many of her projects were developed, tested and deployed in Agile fashion and her knowledge of Agile is very impressive.  She is both experienced as a scrum master and as a QA lead for Agile projects.  Some of the release deployments have been only successful because of her knowledge, team work and dedication towards her work and I am very thankful that she was part of the team.

summary: A detail-oriented, analytical, and results-oriented senior IT project manager with broad experience in software development, policies and procedures, release management, training and development, program management, Agile, SDLC and production support, cloud computing, IT auditing, and security and risk management. Additional proficiencies include change management, implementations, penetration testing, continuous delivery pipeline, DevOps, threat modeling, and analysis and reporting. Displays exceptional problem solving and organizational skills to improve workflow processes, provide safe and compliance technical environments, and seamless workflow. A dedicated and versatile leader who enables an organization to operate at optimal efficiency.Certifications:CISA, CRISC, CSM, ITIL, PMP
